com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

Class PropertyValueNodeTranslator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.AbstractTranslator<T>
      • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.PropertyValueNodeTranslator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Translator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValueTranslator

    public abstract class PropertyValueNodeTranslator<T>
extends AbstractTranslator<T>

    Helper which expects a property value in the data structure and throws an exception if one is not found. Also handles null checking.

    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer
